attributes.action: stop social landlords refusing permission for eco friendly heating adaptions by creating a national policy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Councils and housing associations should not withold permission for tenants to install these systems without good reason.
If a property has a chimney and the tenants require a woodburning heater or rayburn installed as long as the alterations are done to building safety regulations and are paid for by the tenant permission should not be witheld. They are a eco-friendly (carbon neutral), viable alternative to oil, coal, gas and electric. The same goes for solar water heating, councils go on about being environmentally friendly with green agendas but frequently refuse permission for such systems!
